entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye is a person who has been killed by Voldemort. He was heading north with Dung when they were attacked.

entities.name: dung
entities.description: Dung is a person who was with Mad-Eye when he was killed by Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the one who killed Mad-Eye and Dung. He can fly.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is Harry's cousin who witnessed the death of Mad-Eye and Dung.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is Bill's wife who also witnessed the death of Mad-Eye and Dung.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a person who tried to comfort Harry after he heard about Mad-Eye's death.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who was affected by Mad-Eye's death.

relationships.description: Voldemort killed Mad-Eye with a curse.
Bill witnessed the death of Mad-Eye.
Fleur also witnessed the death of Mad-Eye.
